question: In which one of the following reactions, rate constant has the unit mol $L^{-1}s^{-1}$?
choices: Decomposition of HI on the surface of Gold
explanation: The unit $mol~L^{-1}~s^{-1}$ corresponds to a Zero Order reaction.
Decomposition of gases on metal surfaces (like HI on Gold) at high pressure is typically a Zero Order reaction.
